DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate efficacy safety/tolerability subcutaneous MK-3222 , follow optional long-term safety extension study , participant moderate-to-severe chronic plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Subcutaneous MK-3222 , Followed Optional Long-Term Safety Extension Study , Participants With Moderate-to-Severe Chronic Plaque Psoriasis ( MK-3222-010 )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis moderatetosevere plaque psoriasis least 6 month prior study enrollment A candidate phototherapy systemic therapy For extension study : must complete Part 3 base study For extension study : must achieve least PASI50 response end Part 3 base study For extension study : must receive active MK3222 treatment within 12 week prior end Part 3 base study Premenopausal
